name: Composite Bow
description: A common weapon used by hunters in the snowfield. Easy to handle with very high accuracy. After enough promotion, it has earned more than half of the affordable civilian market.

skills.normal_des:
While on the ground, draw the bow repeatedly to attack 5 times.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
skills.dodge: Dodge right before getting hit to activate a Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While dodging, you gain hitstun immunity for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.
skills.skill: Backflips and fires <shuzhi>1</> piercing shot forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and knocking the target back. <shuzhi>{2}</>-second cooldown.
skills.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the wielder</>, and unleashes Explosive Barrage on the target upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
